content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, the apartment is quite new and in the city center. I was thinking of starting at 800 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 950 euros? That is a decent price for such an apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 975 euros is a fair price, considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 990 euros is the best I can offer for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [I agree to the price of 1000 Euros!]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
